entry.title: assumeutxo and UTXO snapshots
entry.summary: Based on the context provided, it appears that learning C++ is a skill that can be acquired by anyone. Even those who do not wish to learn it can hire someone to review code for them. It is suggested that someone with enough knowledge of C++ to audit the entire Bitcoin Core codebase is also capable of running it with assumeutxo disabled and checking the hard-coded value themselves.
